name: The Residuals
description:
Throughout the course of their operation, the many worlds generate superfluous data that ends up unused and gets discarded. This data is drawn across the expanse between worlds and accumulates, giving form to a place known to its residents as 「Remnant Central Boundary」. Due to the collision of incongruent concepts, you can never be sure what might happen next. One thing is certain: it's sure to be a wild ride.

Please consider filling out this survey upon completion so we can make future games even better. Thanks!

The Residuals consists of five chapters, the first four of which can be played in any order.

Play Time: ~2 hours | Suggested Age Rating: 13+

OS: Windows XP/7/8 | Mac OSX 10.4+ | Linux x86/x86_64

Resolution: 1280 x 720 | Disk Space: 250MB
